An ex-cop hunts down the killer of his partner, but discovers a much deeper conspiracy in the process.
A group of treasure hunters search for a lost city in the heart of the Amazon, but must face dangerous predators and ancient traps.
A young girl discovers that she has the power to control time and uses it to change her past and shape her future.
A soldier returns home from war to find that his town has been taken over by a ruthless criminal gang, and he must take them down to save his family.
A group of survivors must navigate a world overrun by zombies and make it to a rumored safe haven on the other side of the country.
A detective is tasked with solving a series of seemingly unrelated murders, but soon realizes that they are all part of a much larger conspiracy.
A team of scientists discover a way to travel to parallel universes, but soon realize that their actions have unintended and deadly consequences.
A man wakes up with no memory of who he is or how he got there, and must piece together his past to uncover the truth and clear his name.
A group of friends embark on a road trip across the country, but their journey takes a dark turn when they run afoul of a dangerous cult.
A young woman inherits an old mansion from her eccentric aunt, but soon discovers that the house is haunted by a vengeful ghost.
A soldier is sent on a mission to destroy an enemy stronghold, but discovers a secret weapon that could change the course of the war.
A team of explorers travel to a remote island in search of a legendary creature, but soon find themselves hunted by the very thing they were looking for.
A man travels to a remote village to investigate a string of mysterious disappearances, but finds that the truth is far more terrifying than he ever imagined.
A group of survivors must band together to defend their town against a horde of bloodthirsty vampires that have taken over the world.
A brilliant scientist creates a machine that can bring the dead back to life, but soon realizes that there are some things that should not be tampered with.
A young woman must use her wits and survival skills to make it through a night of terror when a masked killer begins hunting her down.
A group of strangers are brought together on a haunted cruise ship, and must work together to survive the horrors that lurk in the shadows.
A soldier is sent on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base, but soon discovers that the real enemy is much closer than he ever realized.
A team of adventurers set out to explore a mysterious island, but soon find themselves trapped by a sinister force that wants to use them for its own purposes.
A woman begins to suspect that her husband is not who he appears to be, and sets out to uncover the truth about his dark past.
A group of survivors must travel through a post-apocalyptic wasteland to reach a rumored safe zone, but must face deadly challenges and impossible odds.
A detective investigates a series of grisly murders that seem to be connected to a long-forgotten cult, but the truth is far more shocking than he ever imagined.
A young woman is haunted by terrifying visions of a future apocalypse, and must find a way to stop it before it's too late.
A group of strangers awaken in a strange facility with no memory of how they got there, and must band together to escape before it's too late.
A man wakes up in a world where everyone he ever loved is gone, and he must find a way to bring them back before it's too late.
A woman returns to her hometown to confront the traumatic events of her past, but soon realizes that something evil is lurking in the shadows.

A woman discovers that she has the power to enter other people's dreams, and uses her ability to help a young girl who is being terrorized by a nightmare creature.
A team of scientists discover a way to clone human beings, but soon realize that their creation is not as perfect as they thought.
A man is haunted by the ghost of his dead wife, and must solve the mystery of her death to finally find peace.
